movie.title: P.O.V
movie.description_intro: After being dumped by his girlfriend Zack's big brother decides to throw him a house party in the derelict old retirement home he has been refurbishing. The building has a history; the previous owner believed the residents had become possessed by demons so locked all the doors and set the place on fire. During the party Zack's friends start to fall victim to the same curse.
movie.description_full: After being dumped by his girlfriend Zack's big brother decides to throw him a house party in the derelict old retirement home he has been refurbishing. The building has a history; the previous owner believed the residents had become possessed by demons so locked all the doors and set the place on fire. During the party Zack's friends start to fall victim to the same curse.

movies.title: Suffering Bible
movies.summary: Tales of the Bible are warped into grotesque visual stories, marked by their inventive, but equally terrifying twists on the familiar.
movies.description_full: Tales of the Bible are warped into grotesque visual stories, marked by their inventive, but equally terrifying twists on the familiar.
movies.synopsis: Tales of the Bible are warped into grotesque visual stories, marked by their inventive, but equally terrifying twists on the familiar.

movies.title: The Guest
movies.summary: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.
movies.description_full: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.
movies.synopsis: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

movies.title: The Darkest
movies.summary: A tent in the mountains, in the middle of nowhere. It was supposed to be a romantic weekend in the wild. But when darkness fell, it became a nightmare. They were not alone.
movies.description_full: A tent in the mountains, in the middle of nowhere. It was supposed to be a romantic weekend in the wild. But when darkness fell, it became a nightmare. They were not alone.

movies.title: Birdboy: The Forgotten Children
movies.summary: Psiconautas, los Niños Olvidados ("Psychonauts: The Forgotten Children") is an obscure, disturbing and dismal story about Dinki and her friends and school partners Sandra and Zorrito, three children who live in an isolated island in the middle of the sea, ruined after a disaster in the nuclear power plant that devastated the most part of the island. Looking for a better life faraway of the suffocating atmosphere where they live, the three ones escape from their homes with all money they have reunited, trying to arrive to the coast to pay a ship that take them to the nearest continent. At the same time, Birdboy, another child and a junkie prosecuted by the police, tries to evade his capture at the same time that he tries contain the inner demons using drugs to relax him, trapped by horrible nightmares and delusions about black bird monsters. Meanwhile Dinki, Sara and Zorrito travel through the island facing all kind the dangers and discovering the impoverishment of the island and their...
